creditline: Lent by DRG, DRG Collection and Darwin and Geri Reedy
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: figure comprised primarily of head and headdress with stylized body; copper and brass applied to entire surface of face and headdress and upper portion of body; cowrie shell mouth; back is exposed wood
dimension: H.25-1/2 x W.11-1/2 x D.3-1/2 in. (approximately)
title: Reliquary Figure
